Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When compared with the control group , both indomethacin groups revealed statistically increased numbers of mast cells in the mucosa ( P < 0 . 0001 ) and penetration of lanthanum nitrate through intercellular areas of the epithelium .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| indomethacin |
| control group |
| lanthanum nitrate |

Explanation:

* "indomethacin" is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID)
* "control group" is a group in an experiment that does not receive any treatment and is used as a baseline for comparison
* "lanthanum nitrate" is a inorganic compound used as a tracer in this study to analyze the penetration through intercellular areas of the epithelium.

The term "control group" is not a chemical entity, it is a group in an experiment that does not receive any treatment and is used as a baseline for comparison.
